snippet.title: Red Alert - Broderbund Software, 1981 - Apple II (4K)
snippet.description:
A short presentation of Olaf Lubeck's Red Alert, published by Brøderbund Software for the Apple II in 1981.

I've earlier done a couple of small write-ups on Olaf Lubeck and his first games:
Gobbler and Cannonball Blitz, clones, Lawsuits, clones
https://retro365.blog/2020/10/10/bits-from-my-personal-collection-cannonball-blitz-clones-lawsuits-clones/

Gobbler, Ken and Roberta Williams take on Atari
https://retro365.blog/2021/06/15/bits-from-my-personal-collection-gobbler-ken-and-roberta-williams-takes-on-atari/

Enjoy and please remember to visit my blog at https://www.retro365.blog where I post new articles every month.
